title: About
welcome:
I am a first-year M.Sc. student at Osaka University, Japan.
Project researcher at SANKEN (The Institute of Scientific and Industrial Research at Osaka University).
Participating in Humanware Innovation Program.
profile: I am a M.Sc. student at Osaka University, Japan. I am interested in time-series analysis.
